# save_as_csv
    
  
  
```{r example-save_as_csv}
mon_dossier_temp <- tempfile(pattern = "savecsv")
dir.create(mon_dossier_temp)

save_as_csv(df = iris, path = file.path(mon_dossier_temp, "output.csv"))

unlink(mon_dossier_temp, recursive = TRUE)

```
